statements: SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE regulation_code = 'Reg001'
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = true
SELECT company_name, regulation_code FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE id = 100
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_code, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, regulation_code FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE regulation_code LIKE 'F%' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_code FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE regulation_code = 'HIPAA' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT company_name, regulation_code FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE regulation_code IN ('GDPR', 'CCPA') ORDER BY regulation_code ASC, company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations_compliance;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM regulations_compliance WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT standard_name, compliance_rating FROM industry_standards_compliance ORDER BY compliance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM industry_standards_compliance WHERE compliance_rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations_compliance WHERE compliance_status='Non-Compliant' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulations_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT standard_name, compliance_rating FROM industry_standards_compliance WHERE compliance_rating > 4 ORDER BY compliance_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations_compliance WHERE regulation_name LIKE 'ISO%' AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status, standard_name FROM regulations_compliance JOIN industry_standards_compliance ON regulations_compliance.id = industry_standards_compliance.id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE regulatory_body = 'ISO';
SELECT standard_name, applicable_regulation FROM industry_standards WHERE standard_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT check_id, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE regulation_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA' AND status = 'Approved';
SELECT report_date, regulatory_body FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT compliance_reports.report_id, compliance_checks.check_date, industry_standards.standard_name FROM compliance_reports JOIN compliance_checks ON compliance_reports.report_id = compliance_checks.check_id JOIN industry_standards ON compliance_checks.regulation_id = industry_standards.standard_id WHERE compliance_reports.status = 'Pending' AND compliance_checks.check_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(report_date) AS latest_report_date FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT regulatory_body, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM compliance_reports GROUP BY regulatory_body HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM company WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 100;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company WHERE company_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT company_name, industry FROM company
SELECT standard_name, standard_description FROM industry_standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 10

SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description, compliance_status FROM regulations INNER JOIN compliance_checklist ON regulations.regulation_id = compliance_checklist.regulation_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant'
SELECT * FROM compliance_checklist WHERE regulation_id IN (SELECT regulation_id FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%Security%')
SELECT * FROM companies;
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM companies;
SELECT regulator_name, regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulators_regulations;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status='Pending';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM companies WHERE industry_sector='Technology';
SELECT * FROM companies
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM companies WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology'
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT regulation_name FROM regulations_history
SELECT c.company_name, r.report_date FROM companies c JOIN compliance_reports r ON c.company_id = r.company_id
